card_number.title: Card Number
card_number.X-LLMDescription: A 16-digit number uniquely identifying the card.

card_type.title: Card Type
card_type.X-LLMDescription: Specifies the type of card, such as 'Debit', 'Credit', or 'Prepaid'.

cardholder_name.title: Cardholder Name
cardholder_name.X-LLMDescription: The name of the individual authorized to use the card.

expiration_date.title: Expiration Date
expiration_date.X-LLMDescription: The date when the card expires, typically formatted as MM/YY.

card_network.title: Card Network
card_network.X-LLMDescription: The payment network associated with the card, such as 'Visa' or 'MasterCard'.

additional_info.title: Additional Info
additional_info.X-LLMDescription: Optional field for any extra information related to the card.
